text:
e="preserve">Firsat Sofi Ali (, 21 May 1978 – 18 November 2020) was an Iraqi Kurdish politician. He was a member of the Kurdistan Democratic Party (KDP). He was born in Gazna village in Choman District. Firsat was the Erbil governor from 2019 until his death.
Sofi died on 18 November 2020 in Ankara, Turkey from COVID-19 at the age of 42.
